title: What was the first picture you took with a camera phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: intimcube.Ç̇om How about with the original camera?Currently I am currently using a Sony Z3 with the original camera sensor. I can’t confirm if this is the exact same camera, but I’m pretty sure it is. I just purchased the item from a friend of mine to record some dailies with it and I think that’s the moment that made me use this camera for the first time. What is your favourite camera phone out of the group?I think the one I’m currently using. It’s nice to be able to use a smaller device, because it makes using a digital camera easier. I’ve recently discovered some interesting facts about this world. Can you tell us about them?
